edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.postboard.controller

Class AddMessageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.postboard.controller.AddMessageController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class AddMessageController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This controller responds when the user clicks the Submit button by adding the contents of the message text field to the model as a new message.
    Author:
    Chris Casola
